title: Pixel 3a shutdown automatically when put above Chinese ID card
content:
This may be a funny issue.
When my phone shutdown "randomly", i thought it's caused by that known shutdown issue already fixed in Android Q, until today i figure out it only and always occur when i put my phone on my ID card with it's nfc area.

here's logcat i caputred.(I haven't rooted it so only logcat can i capture, no dmesg or kernel oops log.
https://pastebin.com/bpyDg2Wn

This may indicated a possiable vulnerablity. an attacker may use some spectial raido environment to crash nfc service, then cause this shutdown.

my pixel3a OS version is QP1A.191105.003
